properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tazama, Bikira atachukua
mimba, na yeye atazaa
mwana.
Naye jina lake ni Emanueli,
Yaani ni Mungu
pamoja nasi.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Malaika akasema:
Salamu, ee Maria
Bwana yu nawe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Utachukua mimba,
utazaa mtoto,
Bwana yu nawe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Utampa jina Yesu
ni mtakatifu,
Bwana yu nawe.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mungu atampa kiti
cha babu yake Daudi,
Bwana yu nawe.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Na utawala wake
hauna mwisho kamwe.
Bwana yu nawe.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Mimi ni mtumishi
wa Bwana,
Mungu wangu
Bwana yu nawe.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Nitakubali yote
anayotaka Mungu,
Bwana yu nawe.
